resources.string: Swipe this notification to delete it from the clipboard!
Based on Nic Wolff\'s password generator

"Salasana Android Â© 2016 Xavier Vello: https://github.com/xvello/salasana-android

" "Based on Nic Wolff's password generator (http://angel.net/~nic/passwd.current.html) version 11 apr 2014

" "Icon based on network-vpn.svg from the Oxygen Project, licensed under LGPLv3 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.txt)

"
This form will generate a unique password for this domain and paste it in your clipboard. After you use it, dismiss the notification to delete it from the clipboard.
Hint: you can pre-fill the domain field by calling Salasana from your browser\'s share menu.
